home.spancontent2: Computer and Control Engineering Fresh Graduate
home.spancontent3: Currently preparing for a Cloud Engineering and Network role
home.pcontent: I'm a software developer who is passionate about creating technology to elevate people and help new developers to find the right path. Some technologies I enjoy working with include Javascript, ReactJS.

box1.title: Intelligent Mobile Robot
box1.pcontent: I created this react app to contain all the information about my graduation project, my team, and all the documentations related to it so that it can help undergraduates as I needed help one day.

box2.title: Mint Mind Coffee company
box2.pcontent: Mint Mind coffee company is a clone website of the Starbucks coffee company's website.

box3.title: CV React App
box3.pcontent: This React App is literally a CV, but you can call it a CV on Steroids because it's super interactive, full of details and very flexible.

box4.title: Network 1
box4.pcontent: This is a comprehensive network that i've developed in my CCNA course. In this network, I've applied OSPF, ROAS and SVI VLANs and classful routing.

box5.title: My Profile
box5.pcontent: This React App really amazing. It's a blog, a CV and a portfolio. Translated into Four languages with amazing animations and everywhere and optimal performance. With CSS, React and i18next this project came true.
